explains: n. [助剂] 抑制剂，抗化剂；抑制者
wordGroup: corrosion inhibitor 阻蚀剂；腐蚀抑制剂
trypsin inhibitor 胰蛋白酶抑制剂
protease inhibitor 蛋白酶抑制剂
ace inhibitor 血管紧张素转化酶抑制剂
rust inhibitor 防锈剂；抗腐蚀添加剂
growth inhibitor [分子生物学]生长抑制剂
volatile corrosion inhibitor 挥发性减蚀剂；挥发性防腐纸；挥发性防锈剂
plasminogen activator inhibitor 纤溶酶原激活物抑制剂
mould inhibitor 防霉剂，霉菌抑制剂

sentences.en: Inhibitor drugs have been developed to block two of the proteins, to slow progression of the disease after infection.
sentences.cn: 已经开发出抑制药物来阻断其中两种蛋白质，以减缓感染后疾病的进展。

sentences.en: Dideoxynucleotide is chain-elongating inhibitor of DNA polymerase.
sentences.cn: 二脱氧核苷酸是 DNA 聚合酶的链延长抑制剂。

sentences.en: Kevin is taking the monamine oxidase inhibitor for his depression.
sentences.cn: 凯文正在服用单胺氧化酶抑制剂来治疗抑郁症。
